TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract AccountSelector implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._AccountSelector, class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.AccountSelectorEvents_Event

summary.span: 能够获取在父对象的 Microsoft Office Backstage 视图中选择的帐户对象。

span.span: Provides the ability to obtain the account that is selected in the Microsoft Office Backstage view for the parent object.

para.span: 这是.NET 接口派生的互操作性与相应的 COM 对象的托管代码需要 COM coclass。

span.span: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

para.span: 使用此派生的接口访问 COM 对象的所有方法、 属性和事件的成员。

span.span: Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object.

para.span: 但是，如果方法或想要使用的事件共享相同的名称相同的 COM 对象下，强制转换为相应的主接口调用方法，并强制转换为最新的事件接口，连接到该事件。

span.span: However, if a method or event you want to use shares the same name under the same COM object, cast to the corresponding primary interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

para.span: 请参阅本主题的 COM 对象有关的信息。

span.span: Refer to this topic for information about the COM object.

para.span: 有关 COM 对象的方法和属性成员的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the method and property members of the COM object, see .

para.span: 有关 COM 对象的事件成员的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the event members of the COM object, see.

para.span: AccountSelector 对象具有为其父对象的 资源管理器 对象。

span.span: The AccountSelector object has the Explorer object as its parent object.

para.span: 您可以获取AccountSelector对象的实例资源管理器对象的属性。

span.span: You can obtain an instance of the AccountSelector object from the property of the Explorer object.

para.span: AccountSelector对象提供返回当前帐户已选择 Backstage 视图中的属性。

span.span: The AccountSelector object provides a property that returns the current account that has been selected in the Backstage view.

para.span: 对象还提供用户已更改 Backstage 视图中的帐户时触发的事件。

span.span: The object also provides a event that fires when the user has changed the account in the Backstage view.
